co.cask.tigon.data.transaction
Interface EntityAdmin

All Known Subinterfaces:
QueueAdmin
All Known Implementing Classes:
HBaseQueueAdmin, InMemoryQueueAdmin
public interface EntityAdmin

Common interface for managing persisted entities. TODO: refactor this out once queues and streams evolve and seprate their ways.

Method Summary
